attributes.review: Other than being very, very slow and the quality of the app is bad, there are also very gross pictures of a Cheeto? The app also steals your information. This app should be banned from the US. I would rate this zero stars if it was possible. This app spreads false information as well. If you want accurate information download tiktok!
attributes.title: not a good app

attributes.review: I decided to download this app trying to see why America🧚🏽 is falling apart 👁👄👁only to see a picture of a rotten orange and it made me realzie that’s the core of the issue🤔 I mean isn’t a president supposed to protect his people- my bad he’s no president😗 just a rich, old, racist, homophobic, contradicting, liar, sexist and terrible excuse for a hu- I mean orange🤔 some fruits just got bad, 🤏🏽all the white supremacist just need to learn to throw them away 🧚🏽❤️
attributes.title: The rotten orange

attributes.review: Ok so I got this app to pay my respects and support the president but then all of a sudden my guinea pig started floating and screaming “𝕥𝕣𝕦𝕞𝕡 ②⓪②⓪ Ⓞ🄽 𝗮 𝗴𝗿𝗮𝘃𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗼N̆̈e“̆̈ I was so shocked she could disrespect our president like that!! Then my fridge started walking all over my couch the audacity!! This app also made my dog possessed and my bed started floating super strange, i don’t know if anyone else has experienced this but it was a very scary experience.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: After opening this app, I got a notification from it saying that if I didn’t kill a liberal in the next 24 hours, my house would burn down! I obviously didn’t take this seriously, but right when the clock struck 12, my house burst into flames right before my eyes, along with my new puppy!!!! If you don’t want your dog to die, PLEASE DONT download this app
attributes.title: My house burnt down!

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. I downloaded this app and it downloaded so many viruses to my phone that I had to just go and get a new one. Not even sure why Apple still lets this app get exist when it’s only purpose is to give people who download the app a bunch of viruses and force them to buy a new phone. Hoping Apple comes to their senses soon and deletes this horrible app from the App Store 🙄🙄🤬🤬
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. It is full of glitches and is spamming my phone and email inbox even after I keep unsubscribing!! I’m pretty sure it’s sending bugs to my phone as well. It is NOT a good app and I downloaded it to receive all the information I could about the election only to be constantly fed lies and hate by the Trump campaign.
attributes.title: Do not download!!

attributes.review: this app is so terrible! as soon as I opened it, the screen went black and my phone started glitching. It was like this for multiple hours. Then, out of nowhere, my phone sprouted legs and kept chanting “trump 2020” in a demonic voice. I tried to grab my phone, but it ran downstairs and grabbed a knife!! Then it killed my family. This app is terrible please do not download it I’m an orphan now😢
attributes.title: Moldybread7

attributes.review:
so i opened this app store it and then i was it all ORANGE app store 🏬 is a new app and i was the best app store i is the way i was a PEDO you have been a great 👍🏾 is the day i was gonna was PRESIDENT you guys were going out and i was that i was a cold 🥶 IS the season of this NASTY ASL is a season GET bad app for the first time ME too omg 😆 was a OUT here tryna is that a good thing you can OF been with a few of the people HEREEE was it to be a fun. 

plz nd ty ✨😩😜‼️
attributes.title: just throw away ur phone

attributes.review: I was about to eat my mash potatoes and shrimp for dinner. Then I downloaded this app. I saw a wrinkled sundried Cheeto as soon as I opened the app. I IMMEDIATELY lost my appetite and now I can’t enjoy my dinner. There should have been a warning before I saw a picture of a wrinkled sundried Cheeto. After I went through this horrific experience I ran to the bathroom and threw up. I had to drink a lot of water just to feel better. 🙄
attributes.title: I AM DISGUSTED

attributes.review: I was immediately disappointed after downloading. I had to tap around at the bottom of the screen to tell what was a link for terms of use and what was not. When I opened the privacy policy it was very hard to read due to the text being light gray on a white background. As someone who is visually impaired I am let down.
attributes.title: Horrible App
